languages.text: {n}Некоторое время вы с Ирлиэт стоите в полной тишине — вначале звенящей и напряженной, а затем мягкой и обволакивающей. Вы чувствуете, как Ирлиэт едва слышно выдыхает — с потаенной грустью в голосе. И все же она не произносит ни слова, пока фигуры вокруг не начинают таять.{/n}

{n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время вы с Ирлиэт стоите в полной тишине — вначале звенящей и напряженной, а затем мягкой и обволакивающей. Вы чувствуете, как Ирлиэт едва слышно выдыхает — с потаенной грустью в голосе. И все же она не произносит ни слова, пока фигуры вокруг не начинают таять.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and ringing at first, then soft and enveloping. You can feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly — sadness hiding in her voice. But she still remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

{n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and ringing at first, then soft and enveloping. You can feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly — sadness hiding in her voice. But she still remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

{n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

{n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

{n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你与伊莉耶特肃立良久，相顾无言。最开始的紧张与尴尬很快化解在平和融洽的气氛中。你听到伊莉耶特轻柔的吐息，以及她的叹息中潜藏的一缕忧伤，但她始终缄口不言，直到你们身旁的幽影开始逐渐消散。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你与伊莉耶特肃立良久，相顾无言。最开始的紧张与尴尬很快化解在平和融洽的气氛中。你听到伊莉耶特轻柔的吐息，以及她的叹息中潜藏的一缕忧伤，但她始终缄口不言，直到你们身旁的幽影开始逐渐消散。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet y tú permanecéis {mf|juntos|juntas} en silencio absoluto durante un rato; tenso e incómodo al principio, pero luego dulce y envolvente. Notas que Yrliet suspira suavemente y percibes la tristeza oculta en su voz. Pero guarda silencio hasta que las figuras fantasmales que os rodean empiezan a difuminarse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet y tú permanecéis {mf|juntos|juntas} en silencio absoluto durante un rato; tenso e incómodo al principio, pero luego dulce y envolvente. Notas que Yrliet suspira suavemente y percibes la tristeza oculta en su voz. Pero guarda silencio hasta que las figuras fantasmales que os rodean empiezan a difuminarse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le silence se fait entre vous deux. D'abord tendu et gêné, il devient peu à peu confortable et rassurant. Yrliet pousse un soupir presque inaudible dans lequel vous percevez de la tristesse, mais elle garde le silence jusqu'à ce que les silhouettes qui vous entourent commencent à disparaître.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le silence se fait entre vous deux. D'abord tendu et gêné, il devient peu à peu confortable et rassurant. Yrliet pousse un soupir presque inaudible dans lequel vous percevez de la tristesse, mais elle garde le silence jusqu'à ce que les silhouettes qui vous entourent commencent à disparaître.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du und Yrliet steht eine Weile in völliger Stille zusammen – zunächst angespannt und unbeholfen, dann sanft und einhüllend. Du spürst, wie Yrliet leise seufzt, und hörst die versteckte Traurigkeit in ihrer Stimme. Aber sie schweigt, bis die geisterhaften Gestalten um dich herum zu verschwinden beginnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du und Yrliet steht eine Weile in völliger Stille zusammen – zunächst angespannt und unbeholfen, dann sanft und einhüllend. Du spürst, wie Yrliet leise seufzt, und hörst die versteckte Traurigkeit in ihrer Stimme. Aber sie schweigt, bis die geisterhaften Gestalten um dich herum zu verschwinden beginnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたとユリエットは、最初は緊張と不器用さに満ちたまま、しばらくの間、完全な沈黙の中に共に立っていた。あなたはユリエットがため息をつくのを感じ、彼女の声に隠された悲しみを聞く。しかし、あなたの周りの幽霊のような人影が消え始めるまで、彼女は沈黙したままでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたとユリエットは、最初は緊張と不器用さに満ちたまま、しばらくの間、完全な沈黙の中に共に立っていた。あなたはユリエットがため息をつくのを感じ、彼女の声に隠された悲しみを聞く。しかし、あなたの周りの幽霊のような人影が消え始めるまで、彼女は沈黙したままでいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'le birlikte bir süre sessizlik içinde dikiliyorsunuz. Başta gergin ve tuhaf olsa da sonrasında yumuşak ve kucaklayıcı hissediyorsunuz. Yrliet'in iç çektiğini ve sesinde gizlenen mutsuzluğu duyuyorsun. Fakat hayaletimsi varlıklar ortadan kaybolmaya başlayana kadar sessiz kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You and Yrliet stand together in complete silence for a while — tense and awkward at first, then soft and enveloping. You feel Yrliet sigh ever so slightly, and you hear the sadness hidden in her voice. But she remains silent until the ghostly figures around you start to disappear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'le birlikte bir süre sessizlik içinde dikiliyorsunuz. Başta gergin ve tuhaf olsa da sonrasında yumuşak ve kucaklayıcı hissediyorsunuz. Yrliet'in iç çektiğini ve sesinde gizlenen mutsuzluğu duyuyorsun. Fakat hayaletimsi varlıklar ortadan kaybolmaya başlayana kadar sessiz kalıyor.{/n}
